turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Speaker of the House of Assembly of Dominica.
turn.1: What is the difference between the Speaker of the House of Assembly and the Chairman of the Senate?
turn.2: Speaker of the House of Assembly of Dominica The Speaker of the House of Assembly of Dominica is responsible for the management and general administration of the House, ensuring that rules of procedure are followed.
turn.3: Who is the Speaker of the House of Assembly?
turn.4: The Speaker is elected by the House of Assembly at its first sitting after a general election.
turn.5: Can the Speaker of the House of Assembly vote?
turn.6: A member of the House who is elected as Speaker can only vote to break ties (a casting vote).
turn.7: Can someone outside the House of Assembly become Speaker?
turn.8: If someone outside the membership of the House is elected as Speaker, they become a member, but cannot cast an original or casting vote.
turn.9: Who has been the Speaker of the House of Assembly?
turn.10: Louis Cools-Lartigue, OBE, was the speaker of its predecessor, the Legislative Council until 1967.
